items.sentence: I said goodbye to a friend at the train station.
I tried to find something to defend myself with.
Tom didn't seem surprised Mary hadn't done that.
Tom wasn't surprised that Mary hadn't done that.
I feel very sick. I think I'm going to throw up.
We used a different method to do that this time.
In the hut, there is a ladle with a long handle.
Will you be doing anything special this weekend?
Tom is the third youngest child in kindergarten.
Tom got time and a half when he worked overtime.
I really don't understand why this is happening.
That's not the main reason Tom wants to do that.
If only you could've stayed a little bit longer.
It never crossed my mind that Tom would do that.
I was hoping that someone would help me do this.
I don't think that this is going to be much fun.
I turned on the heater because it was very cold.
It's possible to survive on just rice and beans.
It's doubtful anything will get done here today.
Tom wished Mary had told him about that earlier.
I've been reading and writing email all morning.
Tom doesn't have to wear glasses when he drives.
Tom doesn't have to be the first one to do that.
Tom has been confined to a bed for three months.
Tom has been a basketball coach for three years.
Tom isn't the one who usually washes the dishes.
I don't like anyone to intrude when I'm working.
Tom cooked Mary meals while she was sick in bed.
Tom will likely be here in about thirty minutes.
Tom got arrested for being drunk and disorderly.
Tom's job is to help people find a suitable pet.
I've decided to study French instead of English.
I've decided to go to Boston instead of Chicago.
Would you please fax the application form to me?
Can you recommend a good restaurant around here?
How many pieces of luggage will you be checking?
Are you sure you want to start doing that today?
You're too old to apply for the job, aren't you?
You're way too old to be doing this, aren't you?
I don't think that I've ever seen Tom with Mary.
I don't think that I could do what Tom is doing.
I don't think that Tom has to do that right now.
What other cities in Australia have you been to?
I suspect that Tom has been drinking on the job.
If you want a drink, you can buy one over there.
Tom ordered Mary a drink with an umbrella in it.
I had no idea how much fun this was going to be.
Tom was one of the three who died in the attack.
Tell Tom that I'm not going to do that with him.
Tom told me he doesn't really care what happens.
